CustomField.description: Defines the structure and types of input arguments the Agent/LLM MUST provide when invoking this specific capability (identified by this binding's 'Developer Name'). This JSON Schema is presented to the language model.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Required. Defines input parameters the LLM MUST provide when invoking this capability name. Use valid JSON Schema format, e.g., {"type":"object", "properties": {"paramName": {"type": "string"}}, "required": ["paramName"]}. Critically, this must align with the 'LLM Input Parameter Schema' on the linked Action Definition to ensure the backend logic receives correct data. Often copied from Action Def. Use default {"type":"object", "properties":{}} if no params are needed or unsure.
CustomField.label: Capability Input Schema (JSON for Agent)
